channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: We explore alpine planting and find out how landscapers are using it in their designs. Linda Galvad shows you how to plant your own micro greens.

channel.desc: on this weeks episode, there are homes that aren't afraid to assert their presence. We will have a look inside a house that might be small in scale, but is large in ambition and possibility.
